      • move

        public boolean move​(Tank tank,
                    Direction direction,
                    double speed)
             throws IllegalTransitionException,
                    LimitExceededException,
                    TankDoesNotExistException
        Currently restricts tank movement to forward or backward, if sideways returns false.
        Parameters:
        tank - tank
        direction - direction of tank
        Returns:
        true - inMemoryGameRepository.move gets invoked, false - return false
        Throws:
        IllegalTransitionException - not used
        LimitExceededException - not used
        TankDoesNotExistException - not used

      • isSameRelativeDirection

        public boolean isSameRelativeDirection​(Direction tankDirection,
                                       Direction requestedDirection)
        Subfunction of move to check that the tank and requested move direction are same or inverse... ... ie: forward and backward, left and right
        Parameters:
        tankDirection - the tanks current direction
        requestedDirection - requested direction for movement
        Returns:
        true or false based on if the move is possible or restricted

        tank - the tank
        bulletType - The bullet type
        Returns:
        The bullet type if true and -1 if false
